TopicTitle: OK. You wished for all the money in the world...

Articles.Content:
What are you going to do with $241 Trillion U.S. Dollars?

Infographic

What are you going to do with $241 Trillion U.S. Dollars?

Nothing. If I have all the dollars, and everyone else has no dollars, they have ceased to be a useful means of exchanging value and would become worthless, replaced by some other measure of exchange.
I'd take the giant potato. Hopefully it will become sentient and create more money, so I can also get the tortoise. Copious amounts of money are fun.

If I had all 241T and money still had meaning. I would make people offers to entertain me for various amount of money.

"Oh, you want $25,000? Cover yourself in mayonnaise wearing a tomato hat, shoes made of bacon, and lettuce underpants. Then run the length of 8 city blocks yelling, 'I'm a BLT eat me!'"

Then, I'd say, "No, not convincing enough, but here's $15,000 for your effort.
